info.title: FreeSMS8
info.description: Send unlimited SMS to any Indian mobile number using this API, all you need is an account from freesms8.co.in

parameters.name: msg
parameters.description: Message to be sent as SMS

parameters.name: phone
parameters.description: Recipients 10-digit phone numbers separated by semicolon

parameters.name: pwd
parameters.description: Password of the account registered on freesms8
